subject: excellent work
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey guys,

this is what I'm talkin about !

Really good files 99% had clear loud legible answers that you confermed
hearing in real time by repeating the spirit answers.

A+++ guy's that how you do research. Make sure you document the time
day and conditions of the session, also where in your home the session
was done. I know you have been experiencing a bad signal reception and
where not getting great communication. but whatever the curcumstances
where for this session try and repeat them.

great work
Bruce
